snippet: Brook Lopez, the 7-foot center recovering from a sprained right foot, practiced pain-free on Monday, but remained a game-time decision against the Knicks on Tuesday.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets center Brook Lopez, recovering from a sprained right foot, practices with team, but it remains unclear whether he will play in upcoming game against New York Knicks.
lead_paragraph: Brook Lopez, the 7-foot center recovering from a sprained right foot, practiced pain-free on Monday, but remained a game-time decision against the Knicks on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Brook Lopez Is Ray of Hope for Nets, but His Status Remains Uncertain
headline.main: Ray of Hope in Lopez, but Nets Are Cautious
headline.print_headline: Ray of Hope in Lopez, But Nets Are Cautious
